title: Punishment for one who wronged someone who is unwilling to forgive | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: and finally Samia says if I have wronged someone I sought his forgiveness he does not want to forgive me what will be my fate on the day of judgement you have to keep on asking their for forgiveness if they don't you repent to Allah you do good deeds you show your remorse and you try your level best to ask Allah for forgiveness as much as you can and if Allah accepts it Allah will make that person satisfied on the day of judgment and you will not be held accountable insha Allah
